alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:18PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cleburne and central White Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 517 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pangburn, or 11 miles northwest of Searcy, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Searcy... Judsonia... Kensett... Higginson... Pangburn... Crosby... Steprock... Letona... Albion... Hickory Flat... Clay... Providence... Dewey... Pickens in White County... Armstrong Springs... Sunnydale... Velvet Ridge... Plainview in White County... This includes US Highway 67 between mile markers 41 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
